page.title: 10SUTTON HILL HOUSING STUDY
page.content: HOME OWNERSHIP_Sutton Hill is a large housing estate bounded by a perimeter road called Sutton Way.There are 2035 houses, mostly owned by Telford Development Corporation.1247 houses are rented,141 are awaiting repair or dereliction and 494 have been sold.153 houses were privately built and purchased. AMENITIES_The local centre was built by Telford Development Corporation to provide shops and services for the housing estate.There are a variety of amenities to save the people making long journeys_doctors,nursery,primary school,play centre,public house,post office and community centre. HOUSING CATEGORIES_Much of the accommodation owned by Telford D.C.is terraced housing with 2/3 bedrooms. Others are semi_detached houses and flats.
